revised_title: Elasticity of Glass Threads and Their Applications in Torsion Balances
tldr: The author explores the elasticity of glass threads and their unique properties, such as their ability to untwist without breaking. They demonstrate how this property can be applied to torsion balances, improving their accuracy and sensitivity. The author also suggests using glass threads in electric and magnetic balances and proposes a new method for creating extremely fine glass threads.
